name: @repo/sanity-extracted-schema
description: The extracted schema from @repo/sanity-schema used for TypeGen

scripts.build: sanity schema extract --workspace cross-dataset-references --path ./cross-dataset-references.json && sanity schema extract --workspace live-demo --path ./live-demo.json && sanity schema extract --workspace page-builder-demo --path ./page-builder-demo.json && sanity schema extract --workspace shoes --path ./shoes.json
